text: |Zone D (Blackwall)|a. This zone is of mixed residential/commercial character. b. This zone should remain lower in height and separated from the nearby Canary Wharf zone. c. Development heights should step down towards the western, northern, and eastern edges of this zone, and buildings should be of varying heights allowing sky views between them when viewed from the river or the Greenwich peninsula. d. An appropriate height for the tallest point in this zone is 130m AOD.|
